entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
